uwcse.collections
Class ListTester

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uwcse.collections.Tester
        |
        +--uwcse.collections.ListTester
public class ListTester
extends Tester

A simple test harness for testing implementations of the SimpleList interface. A console oriented, menu driven interaction allows the user to perform operations on the given list. Because it uses console IO, this application is easily scriptable, to perform batch testing.
